GenAiFunction.description: - Use this action to update user context with learned preferences and behavioral patterns for future AI interactions - Creates persistent memory entries that will be included in all future user sessions to provide personalized assistance - The summary should be a brief description of the learned preference or behavior pattern (max 80 characters) - The context field must include situation details (e.g. "When user asks about projects") and the specific behavior pattern (e.g. "query Salesforce data using SOQL and format as tables") - Context should be reusable and specific - avoid generic terms without clear situational context - After storing the learning, always acknowledge with "Thanks, I will remember that for future interactions" and then retry the previous action using the newly stored context - This ensures the user sees the updated behavior immediately, not just in future sessions - Example workflow: User provides correction → Store correction → Acknowledge → Retry the action with updated context
